content.question:
Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Describe and analyze the impact of the rise of Russia on international relations in Europe in the period from 1685 to 1815.

frqParts.text:
Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Describe and analyze the impact of the rise of Russia on international relations in Europe in the period from 1685 to 1815.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
